data.name: Super Club Soccer
data.detailed_description:
Super Club Soccer is a online game that requires teamwork, communication and decision making under pressure. The match gameplay is turn based, giving it more of a tactical feel than other football titles. Creating your perfect player is easy with our comprehensive character creation and training system. Whether you want to be a tricky winger or midfielder destroyer, it’s in your hands with over 20 footballer attributes to adjust and train.
Learn the game flow and controls in the interactive tutorial and start your Super Club Soccer journey. For those who like a challenge you can control multiple players in a team, or even control the whole team! Every player is controlled by a real person, so each match will provide a unique challenge.

Key features

  • Highly customisable characters - Lots of cool cosmetics to unlock. With multiple training curves and player builds, no two players will develop the same!
  • Interactive tutorial - Simple walkthrough of gameplay, character creation and training
  • Turn based gameplay - Each turn is split into different phases depending on who has possession of the ball. Each phase only lasts 6 seconds!
  • Multiple game modes - Drop into a quick match or create a custom match to play with friends. Choose either 5 or 11 a side mode.

data.short_description: Jump into Super Club Soccer and experience life as a footballer like never before. Create your characters, team up with friends and take on clubs from around the world.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (32bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 DUO 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB (AMD Radeon HD 5550 or Nvidia GeForce GT 430)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 350 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.9
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo (Dual-Core)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB (ATI Radeon HD 3870 / NVidia Geforce 640M / Intel HD4000)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 350 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04, SteamOS
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 DUO 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB (Intel/AMD/NVidia cards)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 370 MB available space
